targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "summary" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$instance$/ AND "type" = 'POWERSUM') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "summary" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$instance$/ AND "type" = 'POWERSUM') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "pool" WITH KEY = "host"

list.name: instance
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "pool" WITH KEY = "instance"   WHERE host =~ /$host/

list.name: gpu
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "threads" WITH KEY = "type_instance"   WHERE host =~ /$host/ and instance=~ /$instance/
